commit.message: "Bug 1298345 - Refactor CanvasRenderingContext2D's texture allocation code. r=Basa9aed3e"

diff:
"a9aed3e bug 394567 - Move SeaMonkey parts of mozilla/themes to suite/, followup 1.1: don't pull themes/ and remove old modern, r+sr=Neil, a=mconnor via IRC
diff --git a/client.mk b/client.mk
index 294acf4..66b669b 100644
--- a/client.mk
+++ b/client.mk
@@ -246,7 +246,6 @@ MODULES_suite :=                                \
   $(MODULES_toolkit)                            \
   mozilla/directory/xpcom                       \
   mozilla/mailnews                              \
-  mozilla/themes                                \
   mozilla/suite                                 \
   mozilla/other-licenses/7zstub/seamonkey       \
   $(NULL)
diff --git a/toolkit/toolkit-makefiles.sh b/toolkit/toolkit-makefiles.sh
index e5215f5..8704cc3 100644
--- a/toolkit/toolkit-makefiles.sh
+++ b/toolkit/toolkit-makefiles.sh
@@ -777,7 +777,6 @@ MAKEFILES_libmar="
 
 MAKEFILES_themes="
   themes/Makefile
-  themes/modern/Makefile
   themes/classic/Makefile
 "
 
"
